profile_positions.description:
As a brand builder, I'm always on the look out for the right partnerships, markets and possibilities to share our wonderful and unique story. 

Building and maintaining relationships with our on-trade and specialised off-trade partners, and introducing Fountain of Youth to everyone that is interested in our coconut water, or that I believe would make a great fit.

I'd like to build the environment for our drink and organise events within communities that share our value's and interests in the arts; music, design, our passion for food and regenerative farming, our love for sports and expansion of the mind.
profile_positions.title: Brand Builder at Fountain of Youth

profile_positions.description:
Together with Nachtlab Agency,  D-Dock and Basecamp Eco Resorts, we created  Basecamp Festival; a festival to promote regenerative design, experiment with new concepts and celebrate life in a way that actually give back more, than it takes. 

I've created a new regenerative F&B concept for the festival, exploring ways to minimise food and packaging waste, using locally and regeneratively produced food, looking at ways to offer a healthy yet fulfilling and delicious meal, eaten together, emphasising on the function of a meal.
profile_positions.title: Director Of Food And Beverage

profile_positions.description:
With The Travelling Nut we've brought a distinctive and unique range of wild and natural independent beverage brands into the Dutch market, positioning the brands into the right markets and thereby creating the right brand value, similar as in their home market.

Having used festivals for most of the brands as a driver into the market, the brands could evolve naturally without losing touch with their own independency or that of their partners.

The brands that we've represented over the years were: 

Michelberger's Fountain of Youth (DE)
Brand Garage (DE)
ROY Kombucha(DE)
Dry & Bitter Brewing (DK)
Herslev Bryghus(DK)
Frederiksdal Kirsebaervin (DK)
Penylan Brewing (DK)
Gamma Brewing (DK)
Kupela Natural Basque Cider (FR) 
Ingwerer (CH) 
Taunusquelle Premium Water (DE)
COLA/BIER Geschmack (DE) 
Michelberger Booze (DE) 
Motel Beer & Coffee(DE) 
Aende Drinks (DE)
profile_positions.title: Founder, CEO, The Travelling Nut

profile_positions.description:
Barenzo was a bar production company, specialised in  tailor made sustainable bar concepts for  cultural and corporate events on alternative locations.

We believed that organising the bar(s) in the best way as possible, where it becomes part of the total experience of the visitor; by offering high quality staff, efficient routing and placing of the bars, offering hiqh quality natural products, and a bar that actually looks and feels like a bar, instead of a factory assembly line, that we build trust and loyalty among our visitors, that eventually resulting in higher spending. 

So doing things the right way creates more value as a result, instead of focussing on cutting costs, taking the human out of a hospitality scenario, not using the power of great products as a communication tool, and so on. 

We've worked as a in-house producer for GZG (2008 - 2013) and Shoeless Festival / Alter Ego Events (2011 - 2017) and various other event organisations like Familiar Forest, Next Monday's Hangover, L.E.T. Amsterdam Studio's, Studio 80, All We Want Festival. 

Next to that we've done many corporate events, press events for clients like Vice, Diesel, DJ Broadcast, Spotify, Converse, Nudie Jeans and Mont Blanc, offering a sustainable and unique alternative so they can set them selves apart, also when they invite media,friends and clients.
profile_positions.title: Eigenaar

profile_positions.description:
It all started  in 2013 with a specialty bar in a Bollywood tent,  where I was allowed to offer a rather unique range of independent drinks at small area at the renown Mysteryland Festival. 

The next year I had been given the opportunity to create my own area and the Bollywood Bar Area was born; a place where you, not only can drink better drinks, eat great food, but also listen to a more eclectic sound from all over the world, over a high quality sound system. 

I've been responsible for the programming of the area for the 3 years we had the area, and overall production.

I programmed the area's with my favorite dj's and friends, and as a dj myself that loves to play long sets, I also gave our artists the time to tell their story. 

2014
Line-up: Vintage Voodoo (Alex Figuera), Orheu The Wizard & Calypso Steve (RLR), Sadar Bahar
2015
Saturday line-up: Abel (RLR) & Jamie Tiller(RLR) & Calypso Steve (RLR), Invisible City Sound System,Orpheu The Wizard & Young Marco
Sunday line-up: Cher Monsieur & Enrique's Groove, San Proper, Raphael Top Secret, Volcov 
2016 
Saturday line-up: Taylan Alan & Martinos Tsavidis(Triphouse), Frits Wentink(live), Baba Stilz, Steven Pieters & Khalil (Triphouse), Studio Barnhus
Sunday line-up: Steel Bonus & Calypso Steve, Kejeblos, Afrobot & Baris K
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Studio Soulrock was an Amsterdam based bookings agency and record label of electronic music.

I was the agent of Steven Pieters and Khalil & Steven Pieters(Triphouse, Rotterdam), and Immer.

As an agent I was responsible for all inquiries and actively promoting our artists to organisations, clubs and events that fitted our artists, maintaining relationships with bookers and organisations, and making sure everything was arranged well in order for our artists to perform; negotiation of the right slot, negotiation of the right fee, arranging (inter)national travelling, making sure the technical and hospitality riders were met, and the right communication was applied, and creating contracts for our artists.
profile_positions.title: Agent | Events

profile_positions.description:
The Burgermeester is an Amsterdam based burger restaurant with two location and one of the first burger places with gastronomy level burgers. 

Next to their outstanding quality burgers, the company itself is also outstanding in their way of training new and inexperienced staff members, and their overal operations.

As an operational manager, I was responsible for all daily operations; managing staff, ordering products, and overall quality control of the locations. 

I especially liked to train new staff and guiding them into their new roles over time.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
Sunday Groove was a party in Amsterdam that combined day and night programming of high quality electronic music, food and drinks at Vanzz Restaurant at Station Bijlmer Amsterdam East. 

It's location was perfect for such a concept as it had a big terrace with water view, an open and multi level inside, and being in an industrial area, there was zero  change for noise disturbance, making it possible to have a big sound system outside on the terrace as well, as inside. 

Line-up: 
Daytime: DWIG(Giegling) ,Steven Pieters & Khalil (Triphouse Rotterdam), Steve Rachmad (Discoset)
Nighttime: Iron Curtis, Fred P
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
365Mag was an e-zine about electronic music and the related subcultures / lifestyles. It was founded in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, in 2004 and became defunct in 2015.

I've had the opportunity to do my final thesis at 356MAG, creating a new and sustainable festival concept, with the focus on the design and layout of a festival site:

- most efficient use of the area for multiple stages in the middle with shared backstage and technique. 
- most efficient use of the sound design for the stages, that is less damaging for the visitors ears, and creating sound free area's that can be used for F&B or toilets, 
- most efficient places for F&B and sanitairy outlets; easy routes for suppliers and emergency services. 
- waste management 
- use of natural produce

Next to the thesis, I also participated in the organisation of a weekly event at the Sugar Factory in Amsterdam, called MIKO, together with dj Leama and small team, we've build up a successful night around electronic music, where I was responsible for production but also marketing and programming the event.
profile_positions.title: Intership (Final Thesis)

profile_positions.description: At the end of my internship, where I started out as allround production, I started to focus more and more on the bar production; where I installed more processes for a stream lined bar at alternative locations, where I incorporated my experience gained at The Fabulous Shaker Boys and managed in house the bars of many events during 2009 and 2011, before I started my own bar production company Barenzo.
profile_positions.title: Barmanager

profile_positions.description:
I'm following an traineeship at GZG Amsterdam as a allround trainee for 4 months. 

GZG Amsterdam is a eventorganisation speciallised in innovative dance events where quality, cosiness, hospitality, experience are the main values. The are different from other party organisations because the provide the visitor a group bonding feeling, by creating a total experience of togetherness, love for musice, and innovation of music and locations.
profile_positions.title: Trainnee
